resources.string: Notification for service which periodically checks for vaccine availability.
Checking for vaccine availability in background…
Vaccine is now available in your region. Tap to learn more…
No application to send Email. Please send feedback to om.software.developers@gmail.com

This app notifies you when vaccine in your region becomes available (only for India).
 
1. Enter your region's pin code or selecting your district.
 2. Enter your age.
 3. You can select optional filters such as vaccine names.
 4. Click SUBMIT button.
 
If vaccine is available, you will see details of the same. Otherwise the app will start checking for vaccine status and you will be notified once vaccine is available.

This app periodically checks for vaccine availability over the internet and notifies the user once vaccines are available. This app uses public API provided by COWIN as the source of data. This app is not affiliated with COWIN or government of India.
